While spent nuclear fuel is stored safely and securely, many communities currently hosting materials never agreed to do so.

It is crucial that communities ‚Äì including Haddam and Waterford ‚Äì have a say in the process of storing these materials.

I welcome the Department of Energy‚Äôs opening of a ‚Äúrequest for information‚Äù as a first step in developing a process for moving spent nuclear fuel in our local communities to interim storage sites.

We are past due for a long-term solution to this ongoing challenge. https://t.co/qmfQoBORU4
